metadata.name: Woven Polygons
metadata.description:
Four interlocking triangles pulse in and out while rotating clockwise.  They are all tangled with a hexagon rotating counterclockwise.  The colors were taken from an illuminated manuscript full of Celtic knots.  Like those knots, this piece plays with the tension between 2D and 3D.  I created it using a weave node of my own design.

mp4 | 1080 x 1080 | 25fps | 14s
